channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-483] Error message X0X07 has incorrect property name, db2j.database.classpath instead of derby.database.classpath
item.description:
Example output is in the test lang/dcl.sql, extracted here.

ERROR X0X07: Cannot drop jar file '"EMC"."MAIL_APP"' because its on your db2j.database.classpath '"EMC"."MAIL_APP"'.

Also the its should be it's (it is).
Might also make sense to change drop to remove, as the procedure is called remove_jar.
item.summary: Error message X0X07 has incorrect property name, db2j.database.classpath instead of derby.database.classpath

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Patch enclosed. Courtesy of vim: ":/^X0X07.S=/ s/db2j.database/derby.database/" on all the localized property files under java/engine/org/apache/derby/loc/, and also the other suggested fixes for the english property file. (My first derby patch! Yay! =)
Oops, forgot to update unit tests accordingly. Fixed (and tested) patch coming RSN. =)

New patch (DERBY-483-2.patch) includes necessary updates to function tests as well. Remaining failures seem unrelated to any error messages.
